data.text: Luwa diambu diadi beno batu boso :
batu baphamba ayi batu banneni,
Munuꞌama wela tuba mambu ma nduenga,
Ndiela balula dikutu diama mu diambu di wa zingana,
Bila mbi mfueti monina tsisi
Bantulanga diana diawu mu bima biawu
Mutu kalendi baka bu kuidila ko, luzingu lu mutu wunkaka,
Thalu yi khudulu yi luzingu yibeki luvalu lunneni,
mu diambu kazinga mu zithangu zioso
Bila babo beti mona ti bankua nduenga balembo fua ;
Biziami biawu biela banga zinzo ziawu mu zithangu zioso ;
Vayi mutu, ka diambu ko beki kimvuama kazinganga buwombo ko.
Mawu mama mambu meti buila batu bobo beti tula diana mu bawu veka
Banga nkangu wu mamemi, bakubuku mu diambu di tsi bafua ;
Vayi Nzambi wela kula luzingu luama mu lulendo lu tsi bafua,
Kadi mona tsisi mutu bu kalembo baki kimvuama
Bila kalendi nata kadi kima ko mu thangu kela fua.
Bu kabedi moyo wukimona mutu wu lusakumunu
Wela kuenda bata tsungi yi madise mandi ;
Mutu widi kimvuama ayi kambulu diela
